meanings.definition: Saturniids: a family of large moths known for their colorful wings.
meanings.sent1: The saturniids fluttered gracefully in the moonlight.
meanings.sent2: I spotted a beautiful saturniids moth in the garden.
meanings.sent3: The saturniids decided to have a wing coloring contest.
meanings.sent4: Her dress was as vibrant as the wings of a saturniids moth.
meanings.sent5: The children were amazed by the size of the saturniids moth.

meanings.definition: Saturniids: relating to or characteristic of moths in the family Saturniidae.
meanings.sent1: The saturniids caterpillar slowly crawled up the tree.
meanings.sent2: The scientist studied the unique saturniids behavior.
meanings.sent3: The party decorations were inspired by the saturniids' colors.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes sparkled like the iridescent wings of a saturniids moth.
meanings.sent5: The garden was filled with the enchanting presence of saturniids moths.
